questions.question: The maximum generated voltage in power generating stations in advanced countries is 33kV while that in India is _________
The transmission lines and feeders are _____________
The transmission lines are _____________
Copper conductor is _____________

answers.b: Highly durable and has high scrap value
answers.c: It has high current density, so lesser X-sectional area of conductor is required

questions.question: The sag in aluminium conductors is __________ the copper conductors.
Choose the proper set of increases order of mechanical strength of the following line supports :

answers.a: Wooden poles > steel poles > steel towers > R.C.C poles
answers.b: Wooden poles > steel towers > steel poles > R.C.C poles
answers.c: Wooden poles > steel poles >R.C.C poles > steel towers
answers.d: Wooden poles > R.C.C poles >steel poles > steel towers

questions.question: A good porcelain insulator has compressive strength of about _________ and dielectric strength of _________ of its thickness.
Steatite is produced by mixing ___________ with small proton of ________ and ___________.
Development of 11KV/433 volts substation automation scheme using PLC for cyclic ON/OFF load control schemes
The skin effect is negligible when the supply frequency is ________ and the conductor diameter is _________.
The factor which effect skin and proximity effects are ___________

answers.c: Size of the conductor and distance between the conductors

questions.question: In medium transmission lines ________

answers.c: Both length is between 50 km and 160km and operating voltage is between 21kV and 100kV

questions.question: _______ is the r.m.s value of current which the Circuit breaker is capable of carrying continuously at its rated frequency under specified conditions.
Functions of switchgear are ________

answers.a: To localize the effects of faults by operation of protective equipment and so automatically disconnect faulty point from the system
answers.b: To break efficiently the short circuits without giving rise to dangerous conditions
answers.c: To facilitate the redistribution of local, inspection and maintenance on the system

questions.question: Timers are __________

answers.b: Used to run an operation for a predetermined period of time
answers.c: Used to record the total accumulated time of continuous or inter-mediate events

questions.question: In word zero, of timer element, bit 13, is the _______

In an on-delay timer, the enable bit will be true when the timer-timing bit is true. Timer enable bit will be set through the transition from the timer-timing bit to the timer-done bit. Timer enable bit is set as long as there is logical continuity through all input instruction to the timer instruction, no matter the relationship between the preset value and accumulated value.

answers.b: The above statement is true in most of the cases

questions.question: In timer element, word 0 is for ________
In timer file 11, timer 6's timer enable bit is addressed as _______
___________ instruction is used to program a time delay to begin after rung input goes false.
